title: WTT/WTS- Super Freak Blank Back Willett
author: mrvster

posts.post_title: WTT/WTS- Super Freak Blank Back Willett
posts.post_content:
Hello All!!

I have a very special card here....Willett Blank Back......back has some paper loss (unfortunately), but this is 100 % blank back.....I acquired this a while back from a t206 expert who agrees legit blank back.....I 'm not sure it will grade as "blank back" because of the small amount of paper loss, so I'm not guaranteeing it will grade as such....



THIS IS THE ONLY KNOWN EXAMPLE!


Super sweet double blue ink upside down player image!!!VERY RARE! not often are these unique ghost scraps offered.....sexy weird cut borders.........100 % scrap!

the original printer must have inverted this sheet to test blue ink run......2 player upside down image on the front was the result.....(I can not make out the players, but you can see the "belt buckle " in willetts face)....many different things going on....image in border.....a few color passes missing

this is a rare opportunity to aquire a 1 of a kind item.....a piece of history, and a card no one else can own...


MAKE ME AN OFFER!  Don't Miss this Chance:eek:

or, I am looking for Green Cobbs, Cobbs, Rare backed 206, 1986 fleer Jordan rookie, old judges( graded and clear images not skinned), 

or good old fashioned cash....or combos...


I am listening to all offers:)


[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]


DON'T MISS THIS!

all my other unique cards went fast:)

email preffered over PMs
